title: [FR] The ability to convert links to embed previews
body:
### Description

Currently, we can add links as previews when we add new links. But existing links don't have that feature. In the link menu shown below, we should get an option to turn the link into a preview. Notion has this feature. Similar to the issue #7104.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3236ae45-a1b5-4db9-a338-03f1b72e4f01)

### Impact

Any person that might migrate from Notion to AppFlowy.

### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] Allow for non-standard URLs/URIs
body:
### Description

I want to link to my Obsidian vault files using the URI (ex: obsidian://open?vault=My%20Vault&file=filename), but I get an incorrect URL error:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/498473e3-5ee3-4b35-b73c-78532e2a53d3)



### Impact

Being able to insert these types of URIs would allow users to open files in other apps, files + folders stored on the computer, etc.  

### Additional Context

I use Appflowy solo and on my computer 99% of the time, so there's no fear that the URI wouldn't work for a team member, but I understand how that may be a concern for other users.

title: [FR] Turn -> into ‚Üí (Smart Character Replacement)
body:
### Description

Some apps (like Notion, Logseq, and Obisidian's [Smart Typography plugin](https://github.com/mgmeyers/obsidian-smart-typography)) have the nifty feature of turning -> into ‚Üí when typed and hitting the spacebar.

### Impact

10 times out of 10, I'm typing -> because I want it to be turned into an arrow. It would be nice to have the character transformed, or to have some kind of customizable smart replacement feature inside Appflowy.

### Additional Context

Obsidian example:

![](https://i.imgur.com/TIn2YtG.gif)

Notion:

![](https://i.imgur.com/cHKhjYy.gif)

Logseq:
![](https://i.imgur.com/XnPbyCy.gif)

title: [Bug] Missing breadcrumbs and page info on database subpage
body: ### Bug Description When i go in the page of a database item row, the breadcrumb and page info are not visible before a LOOOOONG time ( easy, 10s ). ### How to Reproduce - Create database - Create a row - Open the row - Open it full page - Breadcrumb is missing ### Expected Behavior The breadcrumbs should be viisible $DATABASE_BREADCRUMB > row name ### Operating System MacOS ### AppFlowy Version(s) 0.7.4 ### Screenshots ### Additional Context Maybe related to very slow database performance. CF: - https://discord.com/channels/903549834160635914/903553722804748309/1300524306010341376 @appflowy is being investigating on this side

title: [FR] Drag and Drop linking to pages
body:
### Description

It would be nice to implement page linking via Drag and Drop. At the moment, the implementation is only via "+"

### Impact

Creating page links and table of contents will become intuitive. For example, I didn't know this feature even existed (via the "+" symbol) until I started searching for the feature on GitHub.

### Additional Context

Related
https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/issues/6301

Screenshot
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81e4cd23-df6a-4326-9ac8-4a31b16cd5d8)

title: [FR] Headers should have collapse option by default
body:
### Description

Since the heading implies a short description of the following block of text, it would be convenient to be able to collapse the entire contents of the heading with one click. This is already implemented in Notion and even MS Word by default.

It would also be nice if when creating headers there was some indentation depending on how much they are nested inside each other

### Impact

Structuring and formatting will become more efficient when writing by time, and it will be easier to use and find the necessary part of the information. 

**This will also allow you to match the functionality of Notion.**

### Additional Context

This is how it looks like in Notion:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b673232e-5f71-4b0c-815f-fea411f919ea)


In MS Word:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8e9d6943-07be-4bc8-b65a-ad4821964d51)

body: ### Bug Description Only the first line will be inserted into the block ### How to Reproduce Copy multiple lines of text and paste it into a callout block or a quote block ### Expected Behavior everything on my clipboard is inserted into the block ### Operating System macOS ### AppFlowy Version(s) v0.6.8 ### Screenshots _No response_ ### Additional Context _No response_

title: [FR] self-hosters publish to web
body:
This is now partially available since v0.6.3

- https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/releases/tag/0.6.3

There is a limitation for self-hosters, that the option is offered in AppFlowy, but breaks, due to generating false-positive URLs when being logged on to a self-hosted AppFlowy Cloud instance.

![grafik](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy-Cloud/assets/1645308/bbfa24b5-39d5-4b40-8815-50f79766874b)

Also see:

- https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy-Cloud/issues/680

_Originally posted by @almereyda in https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/issues/716#issuecomment-2217740844_

title: [FR] locate a specific paragraph using a block_id or heading name on published page
body: ### Description I created a lengthy Q&A document and shared it with others. However, they currently need to scroll through the document multiple times or use the search function to find specific paragraphs. It would be more efficient if the link directly displayed Question X upon opening. Allow the users to quickly locate a specific paragraph by a link with the block_id or heading name. Please refer to additional context. ### Impact enhance user experience, especially in documents that are too long to find the specific paragraph. ### Additional Context Gitbook example: After clicking the '#' icon, GitBook will generate a link redirect to the paragraph. https://docs.appflowy.io/docs/documentation/appflowy/from-source/environment-setup/building-on-macos#building-in-release-mode

title: [FR] Luau support, code blocks
body:
### Description

Support for the Luau programming language in code blocks, same issues as https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/issues/5541: bad syntax highlighting
Normal Lua doesn't seem to highlight some of the type related parts of Luau

### Impact

Better to read code that's highlighted

### Additional Context

AppFlowy with Lua

body:
### Description

On mobile, you can onlyn edit properties but not the content of a card (in kanban, list or calendar). On desktop, this is possible.

### Impact

Edit content on mobile. Structured text for cards on all devices.

### Additional Context

Win10 App

title: [Bug] Page title not visible on page
body: ### Bug Description My page name is "My Page Title" but this is not present alongside the icon ### How to Reproduce Create a page with a name, put an icon, the page name is not visible ### Expected Behavior I should be able to see the title aside the icon. ### Operating System MaCOS ### AppFlowy Version(s) 0.56.0 ### Screenshots ### Additional Context _No response_

title: [FR] Drag & drop content
body:
### Description

It would be excellent to have this feature incorporated into AppFlowy, mirroring the functionality found in Notion. This entails the ability to seamlessly drag and drop content to desired locations. Additionally, it would be highly beneficial to extend this capability to include the dragging of items within a 'toggle' element, smth I use frequently in Notion, particularly with code blocks. Here is an example of how Notion does it:

![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/18092968/50b829d8-46d6-4132-9742-1a055158ad25)


### Impact

This feature significantly enhances the application's usability by introducing a more intuitive and flexible content organization system. The ability to drag and drop content, streamlines user interactions and makes the application more adaptable to individual preferences. This feature promotes a smoother workflow, allowing users to arrange and customize information effortlessly. Ultimately, the enhanced flexibility and user-friendly interface contribute to a more efficient and satisfying experience with the application.

### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] Display URL's / Github repo's as bookmark
body:
### Description

It would be great to have a bookmark functionality, like the feature in Notion. Here's a screenshot of how Notion implements it:

![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/18092968/63f03a94-f0f7-47cc-9c1f-6e4346b2435e)


### Impact

This feature enhances the application by providing users with a convenient and efficient way to bookmark and save important content. It allows users to quickly revisit and access specific information, streamlining their workflow and improving overall user experience. The bookmark feature adds a layer of organization and personalization, empowering users to customize their interactions with the application based on their preferences and priorities. Ultimately, this functionality contributes to a more user-friendly and productive application.

### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] visual clue for subpages in the side panel
body:

It's great that the Kanban cards now show with an icon whether text is stored in the card. (Very practical! üëç ü•≥ ) Wouldn't that also be useful for the overview list on the left-hand side? When a page is collapsed, there is no indication whether there are other subpages.

title: [FR] Auto updater
body:
### Description

Hi. 
Tried to search in the open issues but could not find someone asking it before so, here it is. 
I would like to request an auto-updater to be implemented in the program in the future when possible of course.


### Impact

Make things easier in the UX side.
Nowadays, we have to go in the GH page and download via assets a new version when it came out... same as at the site ? ... 
I'm really not sure about the latter one 'cause I do use more GH often then any other.

So a auto-updater would be interesting.
For example like the emulators do a modal window like below.

![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/43047877/340d6d64-f721-4476-8c07-3517308aa28d)

or however you guys think it should be would be acceptable as well. 

I'm only doing a suggestion here.


### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] Filtering for Calender
body:
### Description

The Grid View will support filtering for some conditions.

It will be nice to see this feature also at boards and calendars to hide some specific items (f.e. the done ones)
![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/6043382/5a807f0f-78c3-4b39-b599-fc8840e2bc32)

Also sorting would be nice on board (per column) and calendar (per day) that we can show High Prio at first for example.

### Impact

Better overview for users

### Additional Context

_No response_

body:
### Description

In the Gridview i have created a select box for some state.
I haven't found any function to order these items.
![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/6043382/6d7c7846-8306-43b8-9c83-409bcc224188)

If i will show these in a board view and will group by state, they will be showed in the wrong order.



### Impact

Better overview

_No response_

title: [FR] Customized checkbox
body:
### Description

I'd love the option to check off multiple nested checkboxes at once by clicking the root checkbox. Like, if I held shift while clicking the Cleaning checkbox, it'd be awesome if Bathroom, Bedroom, Laundry, and Closet all got checked off too.
![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/12026239/55407e84-1416-44ae-8803-3ee67487b495)


### Impact

Checkbox users

### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] (don't) wrap column
body:
### Description

In the grid, most if not all fields wrap cell contents if they cannot fit in a single line. There should be a consistent behavior and setting to toggle this on and off, which will allow users to have consistent row height if they wish. In this screenshot, the title field wraps, the multi-select wraps, but date ellides and number has a hard clip.

![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/71320345/26cf128b-5e66-4b57-8021-fc1f107be5d3)


### Impact

Users who want to have consistent row height in their grids

### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] double hyphens to auto format into a long dash
body: ### Description This is the current behavior: Desired: ### Impact All editor users ### Additional Context _No response_

title: [FR] Adding multiple images at once and creating a grid of multiple images.
body:
### Description

I think it would be useful to group images when adding several at a time. Not when adding one image at a time, only when picking multiple.

It could look something like how social media sites group albums for a preview.
![Album grid layout styles](https://i.etsystatic.com/20343555/r/il/06f8b3/2040762720/il_1588xN.2040762720_ojh9.jpg)

It should also allow clicking on an image to preview in full size.

### Impact

Anyone who imports several images.

### Additional Context

I think adding one image at a time, one below the other is too space consuming and also less readable.

Implementing multi-select for images is a prerequisite for this. As I recall this was already suggested in another issue.

EDIT: I think the type of grid and image order should depend on their size.
EDIT 2: Creating an album of existing images could mean having a button in image block options to select images to group. I don't know how this aligns with how things are done in apps. 
EDIT 3: Suggestion on how this could be implemented is creating a separate "image album block" in the `/` menu.

title: [Bug] Icon added on a page should show in menu
body:
### Bug Description

Currently, when we add an icon to any page, the icons in the menu corresponding to this page stay the same.
This is not really a bug, but a suggestion for improving UX. 

### How to Reproduce

1. Open AppFlowy
2. Create a new document page.
3. Add an Icon to the page.

### Expected Behavior

The icon should also be visible in the menu.

### Operating System

Windows 11

### AppFlowy Version(s)

0.2.4

### Screenshots

![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/47064215/ca8f5a23-310c-405a-b0f3-f3c3cb3a320f)


### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] Import a page from the zip file provided by Notion
body: ### Description When we export a page from Notion we get a zip file, which contains a markdown file with all the page contents and another folder having all the assets of the page like images. In the import panel, there should be an option for importing from Notion. Then, we should have options to select what we want to import, such as pages, boards, grids, or calendars. When the user clicks on "pages" they should be able to select the zip file and import their page from there. ### Impact Any user who wants to import a page from Notion ### Additional Context _No response_

title: [FR] Kanban - Allow re-ordering card properties
body:
### Description

I accidentally clicked the "hide" button on my kanban cards' due date, removing the property entirely from all my cards (don't really get the purpose of that button). Now when trying to re-add a date, it's inserted at the bottom, as such:
![image](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/assets/136453208/db6b571e-b007-4b58-a7e1-0a28e32dddc8)

There's currently no way to put that date at the top again, unless I delete and re-add every other property.

### Impact

This would punish users less for not having planned their entire card structure beforehand, and allow additions that don't go to the bottom.

### Additional Context
Running latest release on Windows 10.

title: [FR] : Allow custom prompt for users to generate content through GPT
body: ### Description As a user I would like to have the ability to add prompt for generating content through openAI.. For example if there was a third option in this menu which opened a text box for me to type my own prompt. So after "Summarise" and "Fix spelling" there could be a 3rd option "Enter your own prompt" For example if I am making a note to learn spanish it would be helpful for me to type in "Give me list of 10 spanish greetings" or highlight something I wrote in spanish and type "Check my sentence if there are mistakes in it." ### Impact I think this can greatly enhance user experience and productivity for all users of AppFlowy. ### Additional Context I am not proficient in flutter but I have experience with JavaScript and Python. But I am currently taking a look at getting started guide for development, may be I can implement something like this?

title: [FR] Add Options to scale app text
body:
## Feature Information

Since I have been using `AppFlowy` this is an issue I have been facing, i.e the text is too small and there's no option to scale it either. While, there is an option to scale the in document text there's no option to scale the complete app text altogether.

![Screenshot from 2023-04-17 17-55-35](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37607224/232483453-7cfd1693-f154-481b-a2a5-de0231c57adc.png)
> Here, I have scaled the document text to my comfort but the side bar text remains unaffected.

- It's a normal feature to keep different font sizes for the document and the other app texts, and that should be the same here as well. Thus, we should also keep a feature where the user can scale the text of the app layout (discluding document/editing area).


## Technical Approach

- In AppFlowy we have created `text.dart` to centralize the use of text widgets in the application. However, it contains only three styles `{regular, semibold, medium}` which does not suffices the use cases through out the app.
- While we are not using the `text.dart` throughout the project, the places where we use it we completely override the properties, like:
```dart
FlowyText.medium(
   LocaleKeys.deletePagePrompt_restore.tr(),
   color: Theme.of(context).colorScheme.onPrimary,
   fontSize: 14, // Hard coded value, can not change it via settings
),
```
- In the other places we are simply using the `Text` widget directly and provide the `fontSize: double` as hard coded value.

## Solution

- In `appearance.dart` we define the font sizes and also save it to device. The settings set in `appearance.dart` should be used globally throughout the application, to set the font size. Like:
```dart
FlowyText(
 "Some Text",
 fontSize: Theme.of(context).textTheme.displayMedium,
)
```
> Now when we change the preferences from `appearance.dart` it should be visible globally. Note that this does not alter with the `document` level preferences as it is stored separately via `DocumentAppearanceCubit`.




### Impact

Users which like to scale the App Features excluding the Editing Area, will now be able to change it and view it according to their comfort.

### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] Add multiple views on the same database
body: ### Description Allow users to add multiple views (Grid, Kanban Board, Calendar) on the same database. Support basic operations: 1. Rename a view 2. Edit the view (sort, filter, column order, change to Grid/Board/Calendar) 3. Duplicate a view 4. Delete a view (cannot delete the last one) ### Impact Database users who create multiple views in different layouts to consume a single database ### Additional Context _No response_
milestone_description:
Actual Deliveries
1. Support multiple database views (Grid, Board, and Calendar) of the same database
2. Improve changing the data directory to save AppFlowy data

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Plan
1. Editor
    1. Insert local images
    2. Reminder
2. Customized shortcuts
2. AI: text to image

title: [Bug]  Help & Support Icon text not clear in the Dark mode
body:
### Bug Description

![Screenshot from 2023-02-06 05-10-47](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48531182/216852594-bf366763-9c60-4519-9d55-228423776177.png)

in light mode, this one better but when dark mode, it's display like this,
![Screenshot from 2023-02-06 05-04-42](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48531182/216852664-0396fbd2-439d-4d87-bc7e-16ae2f842b97.png)



### How to Reproduce

I think this is a small bug. We can change font color or reduce background color. I suppose

### Expected Behavior

In the dark mode,  that Help & Support text should be more clear.

### Operating System

Pop!_OS 22.04 LTS x86_64

### AppFlowy Version(s)

app_flowy 1.0.0.1

### Screenshots

![Screenshot from 2023-02-06 05-10-47](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48531182/216852859-b724dd5d-4eed-4a74-8724-9f1cda1038e9.png)  <<<----- Light Mode

### Additional Context

_No response_

title: [FR] Support column layout
body:
### Description

Allow the user to split a section of the document into multiple columns. The width of each column can be adjusted by dragging the separator between columns. It is possible to add and remove columns. A column can contain all other blocks (e.g. TextNode, Callout, Code-Block, ...)


### Impact

Users who want to put content side-by-side.

### Additional Context

example of layout with 3 columns (source: https://www.overleaf.com/learn/latex/Multiple_columns)
![3 column layout](https://sharelatex-wiki-cdn-671420.c.cdn77.org/learn-scripts/images/b/bc/MultiCol1OL.png)

title: [FR] Create a new purple dark theme
body:
### Description

Need to Implement New Themes

We need to implement new themes for AppFlowy. We should offer a wide range of themes to the user to choose from, so that they can improve their experience with our application. One such theme i suggest we should implement is a red + purple theme.

This is my suggested theme:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47064215/203482535-914080b0-9865-4bb2-808e-0c5052e8533a.png)



### Impact

Every type of user can benefit from this feature. Having more themes to choose from offers a sense of customization to the user. This power of customization improves the overall user experience.

### Additional Context

_No response_

milestone_description:
Major Updates:
1.  [Feature] Flowy Editor supports inserting Blocks such as inserting a table-view database into a page
2.  [Feature] Data storage
  i) Export and import user data
  ii) Store data into a user-defined folder path
3. [Infra] Rust code coverage and test coverage

title: [FR]: Move Boards/Docs
body:
### Description

I would like to request if feasible to implement the ability to move boards/docs between the pages as shown in the video below at the moment is not possible!

![Move pages](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43047877/191850042-07db0e71-854a-40d6-b367-626cf3744433.gif)


### Impact

Well, not a big of deal to be honest but in the mentioned example above gif, I've created a board 'Nihongo' (Japanese) with my stuff there and below another board 'DevQuest' which is not related to the Japanese language at all üòÜ so, due to this mistake of mine, a simple move board would be in handy because this way I would not have to create each of my To Dos All over again! 

In this case is kinda of simple, but imagine if i have rather a bunch of these below...

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43047877/191850673-d9013e3f-2c36-4574-a03c-9eab66b5fa00.png)


### Additional Context

None!

I want to migrate from Notion to self-deployed platform like AppFlowy. However, item types like toggle list (and the shortcut to them) are not currently supported. I wonder if AppFlowy has a plan for such feature?

**what types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature**
Users who pay attention to document format and efficiency.

**Additional context**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7655486/190845856-6b6bf88e-6519-489d-a1b9-878de993163a.png)

- Open page in new tab

- Create toggle lists to keep things tidy in your pages

- Alt/Option + click to add a text block above

Bug Fixes

- Double-click a link to open

title: [FR] Documents in Database Entries
body:
# **1~3 main use cases of the proposed feature**
Hello! Thanks for making this app.

My suggestion is to have a document attached to each database entry. This way, users can attach rich text information when they expand the entry, and have the option to open it as a document.

# **What types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature**
- People who want to keep track of recipes
- People who plan videos
- People who plan social media content
- People who plan courses

# **Additional context**
## Example from Notion:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55474996/180076428-e42f08ce-60cc-4eb3-8227-c69d7cb75640.png)

## Example from Focalboard
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55474996/180080962-21ead65b-17ec-432e-bb65-868effd5816b.png)

title: [Bug] dates alignment
body: **Describe the bug** dates in cells are not left aligned **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Create a date column 2. Set a few dates including time **Expected behavior** Left-aligned looks cleaner **Screenshots**

title: [Bug] Auto-select the current date in the date selector window
body: **Describe the bug** When initially set a date value, the current date is not auto selected. You have to click on the date to get Today selected. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Create a date column 2. Set a date value 3. don't do anything but click elsewhere 4. no date is selected **Expected behavior** If no action is performed on the date selector, today should be auto selected **Screenshots**

title: [Bug] Renaming window doesn't close when creating another new option
body:
**Describe the bug**
While renaming an option value persists, I can create another new option value

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Rename an option value
2. Enter another value


**Expected behavior**
Renaming window should auto close

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12026239/171420689-7bd728ef-2c49-405e-b11a-5c4530c51819.png)

title: [Bug] Click the option capsule to create a new value
body:
**Describe the bug**
Entering a new option value shows "Create (the value)" but it cannot be clicked to confirm

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Using a single-select column to add a new option value
2. Click on the capsule button


**Expected behavior**
The new option value should be created and selected 

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12026239/171420154-6a73a105-1b9c-4944-bb94-9810d51084e3.png)

**1~3 main use cases of the proposed feature**
Ex: As a grid user, I'd like to input ',' as a separator when entering numbers using the Number column
Right now, it doesn't recognize ',' as a separator

**what types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature**
Ex: users who work with the Number column to organize data

title: [Bug] Grid Select/Multiselect - Unable to add option after column creation
body:
**Describe the bug**

Just after the creation of a column, I can't add an option for the select and multi select properties.
To be able to create an option I must exit the edition dialog and then reopen it.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behaviour:
1. Go to a grid page
2. Click on '+ New column'
3. Select the 'Select' or 'Multiselect' property type.
4. Click on '+ Add an option'
5. Type a random string
6. Hit 'enter'
7. See the error 

**Expected behaviour**
The new option should be saved and visible.

**Screenshots**

![Screen Recording 2022-05-10 at 16 01 28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22211097/167716259-dfe901ac-04d2-495f-a316-a858b52bed3c.gif)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: MacOS Monterey 12.3.1 (intel)
 - Version: 0.0.4.3.1

title: [FR] Grid Select/Multiselect - color of the badge should be visible while editing property
body: **Use case of the proposed feature** As a user, I would like to see the colour of the badge when I'm editing it. Exactly like I see it when I assign an option to a cell (see screenshots). **Current edition dialog** **Current assign option dialog** We should see the same badges on the edition and assign dialogs. **what types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature** All users using the grid
milestone_description:
Major Updates:
1. [Feature] Grid
 i)  new column types: Link, Checklist

title: [Bug] Links behaviour
body:
**Describe the bug**

I did found some issues with the link usage. Here is the list of what I found (if prefixed with üêõ it's a bug, otherwise it's a behaviour problem):

1. üêõ  Links aren't clickable
2. üêõ Can't remove a link without deleting the text that contains the link
3. üêõ On the link edition/creation dialog you can type anything and it's still accepted, it should only accept URL (from web URL to system (I don't know how they are called) URL like `mailto`, `call`, etc.)
4. Link icon on the tool bar disabled until you select some text, even if your cursor is on a existing link.
5. **UPDATE** üêõ On a link if you add text, the link is cut in two.

<details>
<summary>Link cut in two</summary>

![Screen Recording 2022-06-28 at 12 09 34](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22211097/176228463-a494774f-9fbc-49a1-b918-d0a5264da503.gif)

</details>

**Expected behavior**

1. A link should be clickable (or a tooltip should indicate how to open it, like for example: Ctrl + click)
2. On the dialog to set a link we could have a 'delete'/'clear' button, when we clear the URL text field and click on 'save' the link should be deleted.
3. If the URL is invalid the 'save' button should be disabled and an error message under the text field should explain the error
4. If the cursor is positioned in a link, the link button is enabled.
5. The added text should be added to the link.
6. On a long hover, the user could see a helper that should allow to open or edit the link

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: MacOS
 - Version: 0.0.4.1

title: [FR] Consistency on the icons and texts of the features
body: When you add a new page inside the main page, should there be a full word "Document" and, for example, an "empty file" icon in front of the text? Like here:

title: [Bug] Add button contrast is too low to see in dark mode
body:
**Describe the bug**
Add button appears on left side drawer is not visible in dark mode.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Open V.0.0.3
2. Click on Settings
3. Open dark mode
4. Look at add button on left side drawer.
5. Yes, you can't even see add button 

**Expected behavior**
Color contrast of described button must be higher. 

**Screenshots**
![add_button_contrast_low](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/76657662/156049067-2018a9a2-0a06-4bce-a900-3fee94387d68.PNG)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Windows 10
 - Version 0.0.3

**Additional context**
 - It should be easy fix. Just changing color of add button in dark mode. 
 - I have searched add button for 5 minutes when i switched to dark mode so i think it is huge improvement in UX.

title: [Bug] UI too small on Linux

labels: new feature,good first issue for devs
title: [FR] Support Workspace Settings - name and icon
body:
**1~3 main use cases of the proposed feature**
As a user, I want to rename my workspace and set another icon for it.

**what types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature**
All the users

**Additional context**
Currently, the purple icon and the name are hardcoded. We want to enable users to change them through "Settings"
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12026239/154825335-9324fd66-1cc9-4494-94ed-308cab6bbf3a.png)
There should be a new section in "Settings" called "Workspace":
1. Keep the default as it is.
2. The user can rename the workspace and set an emoji icon. 
3. The changes should be reflected in the left-hand sidebar after pressing the "Update" button on the "Workspace" setting page.

To keep translations up-to-date there should be a way to notify contributors that file with english UI strings has been updated.

Translation contributors

Github action that triggers on push to `main`, filtered by path to english file

**As a** user,

when creating a doc under page, the name of the doc is the same as the title of the doc, but when I update the title, the doc name does not change respectively,
**So that** I can easily update the name of doc the from doc title

all users

title: [FR] consistency edit icon on all pages
body:
**1~3 main use cases of the proposed feature**
**As a** new user, 
**I want** to see consistency in all the option-setting of items (pages) in the app, for example:
- when creating a page at the main page currently there is a plus icon (+) but the inner page has a dot icon (:), rather than one icon (or two as in notion) identical on all pages.
- plus icon (+) always visible, dot icon (:) only when mouse hover

**So that** I can treat any page intuitively

**what types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature**
mainly new users 

**Additional context**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7399564/151043399-7ee4584a-2571-4d0b-a2e7-9c173aa87b57.png)

title: [FR] Partially Checked / Indeterminate Checkboxes
body: **1~3 main use cases of the proposed feature** I suggest to support partially checked / indeterminate checkboxes. A good feature request with examples and implementation details are given at https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/issues/229189. **what types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature** Anyone who thinks task completion is not just binary. **Additional context** Input: ```markdown - [x] Item 1 - [-] Item 2 - [ ] Item 3 ``` Output:

title: [FR] Fonts Settings
body:
**Use Cases of the proposed feature**
As a writer, I want to be able to use my preferred fonts for both normal and monospaced (inline code or code blocks), including their sizes.

**What types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature**
People with specific preferences, maybe slightly OCD driven ones like myself :yum: 

**Additional Context**
At the time of this writing, this is how ver. 0.0.2 looks like on Pop!_OS (Ubuntu based) ver. 21.10 distro.
It looks quite good for such an initial release.
It seems that Ubuntu font is being used for both regular and monospaced formats, although the monospaced format should use a monospaced font, and the size of it should be increased.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14140226/147054040-6eb9c66f-e90a-4f78-9309-3a7c0a8386ce.png)

Thank you for doing and sharing this! :pray: 
Just discovered this morning and planning to contribute since it's using two of my favorite programming languages and frameworks. :blush:

- Insert inline math equations

- Upload custom themes


Planned:

2. [Search v0.1](https://github.com/AppFlowy-IO/AppFlowy/issues/2232)

title: [Bug] Incorrect application folder name
body:
**Describe the bug**
The application creates a directory in the user's "Document" directory called "flowy". As per application conventions the directory should be called "AppFlowy" (ideally), or "appflowy" if you don't want caps in a directory name.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Install and run the application
2. Look in your Documents directory
3. Find the "flowy" folder
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
The folder should be called "AppFlowy" or "appflowy)

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5375835/146252918-bd499cd8-bbbe-4e53-90b6-87260c066837.png)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux/All
 - Browser N/A
 - Version 0.0.2

**Additional context**
The folder name is hard coded. Maybe this should be in the translation files?

title: [Bug] High CPU on macOS
body:
**Describe the bug**
The CPU usage of AppFlowy is always greater than 100:

**To Reproduce**
1. `brew install appflowy` and run
2. Create a page and write something
3. Wait a few minutes and do nothing, the CPU usage is still high (greater than 100)

 ```
Darwin ThearasdeMacBook-Pro-13.local 21.1.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.1.0: Wed Oct 13 17:33:24 PDT 2021; root:xnu-8019.41.5~1/RELEASE_ARM64_T8101 arm64
```
 - Browser: chrome
 - Version: 96.0.4664.93

title: [Bug] Deleting a document page leaves the content area black after deleting permanently.
body:
**Describe the bug**
Deleting a document page leaves the content area black after deleting permanently.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Click on ':' to bring up document menu in the side navigation.
2. Click on 'üóë Delete'
3. Click on 'Delete Permanently' in the banner that appears in the content frame.
4. Content area is left black until a different document is selected.

**Expected behavior**
The expected behavior is to show content from a nearby document that currently exists.

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51428934/145703394-3e78c5ab-818a-4e3c-9432-88901e223a3b.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51428934/145703417-4732f9ee-da9f-4ba3-8c8f-7aae3214d5bc.png)

title: [FR] Emoji picker
body:
**1~3 main use cases of the proposed feature**
While mobile OSs and Windows both have system-wide emoji pickers, most Linux systems don't. Gnome for example has one, but only for native GTK apps. Having a dedicated emoji picker (like for example the one in Discord) would make adding emojis in documents much easier.

**what types of users can benefit from using your proposed feature**
Any user who can't/does not want to use external emoji pickers

**Additional context**
Example of Discord's emoji picker
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52625640/143572178-b494389f-5115-4120-b74c-6eb9a99dfc05.png)

title: [FR] Ctrl + Backspace in Editor
body:
**Describe the bug**
Pressing Ctrl + Backspace does nothing, when it should delete a word.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go and create a page
2. Type a couple words inside, delimited by spaces
3. Press Ctrl + Backspace
4. Nothing happens

**Expected behavior**
A word to be deleted, Ctrl + Right/LeftArrow navigates 'by word' as well, so I suppose this is a bug.

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63487502/142853024-be1918df-b4e9-4fae-9346-b0210fb9b8af.png)
For example, Ctrl + Backspace here should delete a "sdf", but does nothing

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Windows 11 Home 10.0.22000 Build 22000
 - Browser: Vivaldi 4.3.2439.65 / Chrome 94.0.4606.114
 - Version: 0.0.2

title: [FR] Hover on bottom toolbar icons doesn't display a tooltip
body:
Hovering on the icons at the bottom doesn't display a tooltip which can be useful to understand what that particular icon does.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28348429/142756668-382cf5f8-8d5e-49c6-a38c-faae9d82df37.png)

title: [FR] Auto markdown formatting
body:
**1~3 main use cases of the proposed feature**
Writing in markdown, will automatically convert that into the proposed element. For example, if I type a # with a space, it should auto convert that into a heading 1 instead of showing the hash, basically what happens if I click the button on the bottom toolbar instead

**Additional context**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56835743/142386648-90bda60e-63b9-4658-a069-96780e062eba.png)
currently, this is what happens when I try to type in markdown (up), I would like it to be this (down), 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56835743/142387037-74ed7e42-5aa5-4957-a118-0b68b85c9f3a.png)
